sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
    .popup(:class="{'visible': modalVisible}")
        .popup__close(@click="modalHidden") Close
        .popup__layot
            .popup__content
                h3.popup__title Want to become an expert? Fill out the application form
                form#form(name="modal-form")
                    input(type="text" placeholder="NAME" name="name")
                    input(type="email" placeholder="E-MAIL" name="email")
                    label(for="textarea") Your message
                    textarea(name="message" id="textarea" placeholder="Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Maecenas eget purus augue. Vivamus nec neque efficitur, commodo purus id, aliquam nunc. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet")
                    button(type="submit" name="submit") SEND
</template>

<script>
    import $store from '../../components/store.js';

    export default {
        name: 'Modal',
        function(){
            return {}
        },
        computed: {
            modalVisible(){
                return this.$store.state.modalVisible;
            }
        },
        methods: {
            modalHidden(){
                this.$store.commit('modalVisible', false);
            }
        }
    }
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
    .popup {
        position: fixed;
        z-index: 100;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        opacity: 0;
        pointer-events: none;
        transition: .3s all ease;
        background: rgba(247, 248, 250, 0.98);

        &.visible {
            opacity: 1;
            pointer-events: all;
        }

        &__close {
            position: fixed;
            top: 20px;
            right: 20px;
        }

        &__layot {
            position: absolute;
            top: 50%;
            left: 50%;
            transform: translate(-50%,-50%);
            max-width: 618px;
            // height: 59%;
            background: #FFFFFF;
            box-shadow: 0px 4px 30px rgba(52, 59, 76, 0.05);
            border-radius: 6px;
            padding: 65px;
        }

        &__title {
            font-family: 'SFProDisplay-Bold';
            font-size: 23px;
            line-height: 36px;
            text-align: center;
            color: #37393E;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }
    }

    #form {

    }

    input[type="text"],
    input[type="email"] {
        display: block;
        width: 100%;
        margin-bottom: 30px;
        font-family: 'GothamPro-Regular';
        font-size: 10px;
        line-height: 10px;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        color: rgba(55, 57, 62, 0.7);
        padding: 12px 0;
        border-bottom: solid 1px rgba(54,54,54,0.15);
    }
    
    label[for="textarea"] {
        display: block;
        font-family: 'GothamPro-Regular';
        font-size: 8px;
        line-height: 8px;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        color: rgba(55, 57, 62, 0.7);
    }

    #textarea {
        width: 100%;
        display: block;
        padding: 19px 0;
        font-family: 'GothamPro-Regular';
        font-size: 11px;
        line-height: 17px;
        color: rgba(55, 57, 62, 0.7);
        border: none;
        border-bottom: solid 1px rgba(54,54,54,0.15);
        overflow-y: auto;
        max-height: 92px;
        margin-bottom: 35px;
    }

    button[type="submit"] {
        width: 146px;
        height: 43px;
        background: linear-gradient(0deg, #357FDB, #357FDB), linear-gradient(189.87deg, #357FDB -14.01%, #2361AA 109.14%);
        border-radius: 100px;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        font-family: 'SFProDisplay-Regular';
        font-size: 11px;
        line-height: 19px;
        text-align: center;
        letter-spacing: 1px;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        color: #FFFFFF;
        cursor: pointer;
        margin: 0 auto;
    }
</style>
